DatingApplication

Class Responder

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatingApplication.Customer
      • DatingApplication.Responder

  • public class Responder
extends Customer
    A Class that handles the information that correspond to a responder of the Application. It inherits from the Customer base class

    • Constructor Detail

      • Responder

        public Responder()
        A default constructor that is called upon when a Responder Object is created. The constructor initializes the parameters to the default program values. Set by the parent class

      • Responder

        public Responder(java.lang.String firstName,
                 java.lang.String lastName,
                 java.lang.String gender,
                 int age,
                 int income,
                 Login login)
          throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException,
                 java.util.InputMismatchException,
                 DatingApplication.UnknownOpException
        A Constructor that initializes the class parameters to a user-defined parameters.
        Parameters:
        firstName - a string parameter set by the user, indicates the first name of the responder
        lastName - a string parameter set by the user, indicates the last name of the responder
        gender - a string parameter set by the user, indicates the gender of the responder
        age - an integer parameter set by the user, indicates the age of the responder
        income - an integer parameter set by the user, indicates the income of the responder
        login - a Login object that holds the login details of the responder
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        DatingApplication.UnknownOpException
        java.util.InputMismatchException
